text: Pawlikowice is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Chojnów, within Legnica County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south-western Poland. Prior to 1945 it was in Germany. It lies approximately south-east of Chojnów, west of Legnica, and west of the regional capital Wrocław. ==References== Pawlikowice
title: Pawlikowice, Lower Silesian Voivodeship
